articles.content: One of the most significant trends in road bike, mountain bike and gravel bike design has been the move to ever-wider tyres. Thats resulted in an increase in wheel rim widths too, because theres a ne… [+14526 chars]

articles.author: Tom West
articles.title: Xbox will "likely" get Priest Simulator, so save your GOTY nominations - TrueAchievements
articles.description: Goat Simulator has always held a position of authority within the realm of the absurd, but Priest Simulator, which is "likely" launching on Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One, looks like a contender for the Goat's crown.
articles.content: Dubbed a 'mockumentary action game' Priest Simulator mixes the FPS, hack 'n slash, mockumentary, simulator, renovator, and sandbox genres into what might be the wackiest experience to release this ye… [+2011 chars]
